title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 326 - Coordinated-escalator Retirement Plan (co-esc) Membership Contributions And Withdrawals
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 326 - Coordinated-escalator Retirement Plan (co-esc) Membership Contributions And Withdrawals

State Regulations
§ 326.1 - Background and determination
§ 326.2 - Member contributions
§ 326.3 - Co-esc contribution fund and accounts
§ 326.4 - Withdrawal and refund of co-esc contributions
§ 326.5 - Refund of member's contributions on death of the member
§ 326.6 - Interest on refunded accumulated contributions
§ 326.7 - Restoration of credit for previous service

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 2, ch. VI, pt. 326

Statutory authority: Retirement and Social Security Law, §§11, 517

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
